api_list.api_description: Get information about a user by their user_id.

required_parameters.name: user_id
required_parameters.description: The hex ID of the barter.vg user

api_list.api_description: Get an equipment item by index.

required_parameters.name: index
required_parameters.description: The index of the equipment to get.

query: Can you pull up information on the user with ID 'a0' on Barter.vg, and also provide details on a club in the Dungeons & Dragons equipment list?
